alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:16PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lincoln County through 215 PM CDT... At 116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sylvan Grove, or 8 miles west of Lincoln, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lincoln and Sylvan Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central Kansas.
